data.name: Naruto
data.info: A powerful fox known as the Nine-Tails attacks the hidden leaf village. In response, the leader of Konoha and the Fourth Hokage, Minato Namikaze seals the fox inside the body of his newborn son, Naruto Uzumaki, making Naruto a host of the beast.

products.name: Indra Otsusuki
products.data: Son of Hagoromo Otsusuki, Received visual powers from his father.

products.name: Ashura Otsusuki
products.data: Younger brother of Indra got physical powers from his father.

products.name: Madara Uchiha
products.data: The greatest Uchiha from the first war, Only other person to fight with hashirama on equal strength.

products.name: Hashirama Senju
products.data: The strongest ninja Given name of God of ninja, Established Konoha with help of Uchiha and other clans.

products.name: Obito Uchiha
products.data: War surviver of uchiha clan who was lead by Madara to follow the plan of Infinte Tsukyomi. Later lived under alias of Madara Uchiha.

products.name: Kakashi Hatake
products.data: Friend of Obito, Recieved sharingan in his left eye from Obito. Sensei of team 7

products.name: Sasuke Uchiha
products.data: Said to be the last survivor of Uchiha clan, Trained under Orochimaru. Later got power of Indra.

products.name: Naruto Uzumaki
products.data: Jinchuriki of nine tailed fox, Trained under Jiraya. Later gained power of Ashura

data.name: Dragon Ball
data.info: Dragon Ball Z shows the adventures of Son Goku, who, along with his companions, defend the Earth against villains ranging from aliens, androids and magical creatures.

products.name: Goku(Normal)
products.data: Goku in his normal form.

products.name: Goku Kaio-ken x4
products.data: Goku using Kaio-ken times 4 while fighting with Vegeta.

products.name: Goku SSJ1
products.data: Goku transformed to Super Saiyan form on Namek.

products.name: Goku SSJ2
products.data: Goku transformed to Super Saiyan 2 against Babidi.

products.name: Goku SSJ3
products.data: Goku Tram=nsformed to Super Saiyan 3 against Magin Buu .

products.name: Goku Golden Ape
products.data: This transformation is seen in Dragon Ball GT.

products.name: Goku SSJ4
products.data: This transformation is after golden ape in gt and later seen in DBZ Heroes.

products.name: Goku Saiyan God
products.data: This form is acheived by pooling power of 5 saiyans in one.

products.name: Goku SSJ Blue
products.data: Goku acheived this form by training with whis.

products.name: Goku SSJ Blue Kaio-ken x10
products.data: this form was first shown while fight against Hit .

products.name: Goku UI
products.data: Goku first acquired this form when Jiren hit him with his own Spirit Bomb.

products.name: Goku MUI
products.data: In the final moments of the Universal Martial arts tournament goku acheived this form.

data.name: One Piece
data.info: The series focuses on Monkey D. Luffy, a young man who, inspired by his childhood idol and powerful pirate emperor Akagami-no-Shanks, sets off on a journey from the East Blue Sea to find the lengendary treasure One Piece and proclaim himself the King of the Pirates.

products.name: Luffy
products.data: Main Character of One Piece.

products.name: Luffy Gum-Gum Gattling
products.data: Luffy has the devil fruit power of Gum Gum fruit .

products.name: Luffy Gear 2
products.data: Luffy uses this technique to increase his speed and other physical abilities.

products.name: Luffy Gear 3
products.data: which fighting against Rob Lucci Luffy uses this technique to enhance his destructive power.

products.name: Luffy MarineFord Arc
products.data: During this arc luffy unconciously uses Conqueror's Haki and becomes a target for the world government.

products.name: Luffy Gear 5 Tank Man
products.data: To fight against Doflamingo luffy covers his body by armament haki.

products.name: Luffy Gear 5 Snake Man
products.data: This form was unleashed to fight agains katakuri at Whole Cake island.
